name: Ultimate Furniture Stacker X-Treme
description:
Ultimate Furniture Stacker X-Treme is a game about setting up your new pad. Organize your furniture nicely or just throw it in a pile... whatever floats your boat! Oh yeah and be sure to answer phone calls! It's probably your new landlord looking for any excuse to serve an eviction notice!

How to play:
Move your character around with WASD. Spacebar to jump and mouse to turn. Click and hold to grab furniture.

This is a Ludum Dare 42 Entry.

DISCLAIMER: I did not make the fonts! Everything else I made but the fonts I found online.
